### Data Access

### Data Wrangling

# General Data Wrangling

```{r}
# find the total number of counties that voted democrat
party <- primary %>%
  filter(party == "democrat") %>%
  summarize(total_democrats = n())
party

# find the total number of counties that voted republican
party <- primary %>%
  filter(party == "republican") %>%
  summarize(total_republicans = n())
party
```
